text:
Livestream | http://livestream.com | Brooklyn, NY

We provide a full-stack live video streaming solution for thousands of customers, with engineering challenges at every level of the stack. A few of our open positions:

QA Engineer (http://bit.ly/1PQfNhu): We're looking for candidates who have experience with manual & automated testing, and have the flexibility to vet end-user clients as well as web services.

ECMAScript Developer (http://bit.ly/20jOaCt): If you have experience building Flash-based video players with an eye towards the future of video on the web, we'd love to hear from you.

If you have any questions, please reach out: dave.yeu(at)livestream(dot)com.
